Master Veyr.Desc:
A quiet, evasive man. Only survivor of the "accident"?
He won't say what happened...
Master Veyr.Role-desc:
Master Veyr specializes in purity, balance, and final jugdement of items and artifacts.NEWLINEHe rarely forges.
He just decides whats worthy after it's made.NEWLINEThat's why people say his
survival was unsettling.NEWLINEHe's the person who knows when
something is wrong
